q: When Donald Trump said he wished there were a "fantastic" Republican candidate so he would not have to consider running himself, Ron Paul supporters shouted, " Ron Paul " as an alternative. Donald Trump said: I like Ron Paul . I think he's a good guy, but honestly he just has zero chance of getting elected. Everyone cheered except the Ron Paul supporters.
